title: LeBron's manager leading upstart to rival NBA
description: Maverick Carter, LeBron James' business manager, has been enlisted as an adviser by a group of investors seeking to raise $5 billion to form an international basketball league that would serve as a rival to the NBA, sources confirmed to ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: UF hoops asst. faces sexual assault allegations
description: A Florida athletics department employee filed a sexual assault complaint against an assistant men's basketball coach Tuesday as the school continues to investigate head coach Todd Golden for alleged Title IX violations.
author: Paula Lavigne

title: Mike McCarthy comes out looking like the winner in split from Cowboys
description: McCarthy had some flaws, but what he managed to get from his Dallas teams despite significant obstacles makes him look better than Jerry Jones.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Calorie labelling on menus and food products has ‘small’ effect, review finds
description: Labelling led to an average 1.8% reduction in the calories people bought – equating to 11 calories in a 600 calorie meal – or around two almonds.
author: PA Media: UK News

title: Effective and industrious Diallo has 'one of best weeks in my life'
description: Amad Diallo caps a memorable week with a late hat-trick as Manchester United come from behind to beat Southampton in the Premier League.

title: Man City reach verbal agreement to sign Marmoush
description: Manchester City reach a verbal agreement to sign Eintracht Frankfurt's Egypt forward Omar Marmoush.

title: Ref Watch: 'Brooks grabbed Cucurella's shirt - not his hair'
description: Ex-top flight referee Dermot Gallagher assesses the controversial moments from the midweek action, including the first time in Premier League history that an official has rejected a red-card review at the pitch-side monitor.

title: Women's Ashes, Australia vs England: Score and updates from third ODI
description: Updates and score from Hobart with England looking for their first win in the multi-format Women's Ashes as they take on Australia in the third ODI.
